description: This drink has a spicy and sweet taste, with notes of maple syrup and brown sugar. It's easy to make cocktails for any event!
name: Maple 43

recipeInstructions.name: First, add all the ingredients to a mixing glass. Shake up the mixture until it becomes well mixed and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: First, add all the ingredients to a mixing glass. Shake up the mixture until it becomes well mixed and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour it into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes without straining out any of the liquid from the mixing glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour it into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes without straining out any of the liquid from the mixing glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish your drink with a thin strip of lemon peel that has been twisted off in one long piece and drop in some fresh mint leaves for decoration!
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish your drink with a thin strip of lemon peel that has been twisted off in one long piece and drop in some fresh mint leaves for decoration!
